p: LDPCs need institutional frameworks to achieve their NDC (Angola, Sao TEP). Lao PDR, Lesotho, and the Solomon Islands require legislation to strengthen mitigation and adaptation initiatives and integrate (N4.1) them into their development plans. Chad, Burundi, and Guinea Bissau need assistance in institutionalizing a sector-wise (N5.3) adaptation plan to safeguard natural resources. Mozambique reports that these institutional arrangements require financial assistance (N1.1) and Nepal requires to “enact key acts and regulations” to facilitate NDC implementation.
